headline.print_headline: Credit Default Swaps Make Restructuring More Difficult
headline.main: Credit Default Swaps Make Restructuring More Difficult

snippet: An exchange offer involving Norske Skog shows the growing difficulty of restructuring distressed companies and of knowing where bondholders’ interests lie.
lead_paragraph: An exchange offer involving Norske Skog shows the growing difficulty of restructuring distressed companies and of knowing where bondholders’ interests lie.
